title: Welcome to Liberty Village
desc: Short list of colonials with name recognition. Use to introduce visitors to using the QR codes and enter their grandparent so they are ready.

people.name: George Washington
people.desc: Led the continental army and served as the first president of the United States.

people.name: Martha Washington
people.desc: Defined the role of the president's wife, setting many precedents for future first ladies.
people.imageURL: Right click on image in FamilySearch to get url

people.name: John Adams
people.desc: Statesman, diplomat, writer. Served as second president of the United States.

people.name: Betsy Ross
people.desc: A seamstress that legend says helped create the first American flag.

people.name: Abigail Adams
people.desc: Wife and closest advisor of John Adams, as well as the mother of John Quincy Adams.
people.imageURL: Right click on image in FamilySearch to get url

people.name: John Hancock
people.desc: Remembered for his large and stylish signature on the Declaration of Independence.

people.name: Benjamin Franklin
people.desc: Statesman, scientist, inventor. Drafter and signer of the Declaration of Independence.

people.name: Patrick Henry
people.desc: “Give me liberty, or give me death” speech.

people.name: Deborah Sampson
people.desc: Disguised herself as a man, and served in the Continental Army under the name Robert Shirtliff.
